content:
I deleted a user how described in the manual.
but I still can see the user in the List
image.png

How can I remove it?
Hmm, these dummy users that are left behind by deletion are created as active, when perhaps they shouldn't. Can you trying deactivating this user? @Fabian Tribrunner
With Zulip in the browser, a full reload may be sufficient? (Ctrl+Shift+R)

Mateusz Mandera said:

Hmm, these dummy users that are left behind by deletion are created as active, when perhaps they shouldn't. Can you trying deactivating this user? Fabian Tribrunner

That works fine! thx @Mateusz Mandera
Opened https://github.com/zulip/zulip/pull/19903 with a fix for the bug that caused this. Thanks for the report!
Mateusz Mandera has marked this topic as resolved.
